title: Great.
comment: Still the best Android XMPP client in terms of supported features / XMPP standards, power consumption, bandwidth and "overall" usability. Actually, a major UI overhaul is the only thing this app really could do with. ;)
Thank you! We're now working on UI improving.

title: Good but
comment: Samsung note 4.. There's no button to access settings. I want to change alert tone and select mp3.
Touch and hold the recent apps button to call out menu of the current app.

title: Crashes frequently
comment: Really like the interface and multi-account support. Hate how running this in the background for more than 60 mins causes it to grind to a halt. Even the keyboard becomes unresponsive when it slows. Must be a bug. Had same problem with non-development version. Switched to yaxim. May try this again if it gets fixed.

title: Security option request
comment: XEP-0027 (GPG encrypted messages) There are some apps here on the market to give GPG  (OpenPGP) power to the users, but jabber not in this list. OTR works bad, so GPG is the only solution to make our talks secure.

title: Wonderful
comment: This application is just wonderful despite it being a development version, it's fast, it's stable and brings a great UI bundled with MUC, TLS Support and many other useful features. This is by far the only XMPP app i have seen on the android market which comes even close to the offerings i've seen and used on the app store on iDevices. This app is definitely worth the 5 Stars. - Samsung Galaxy S i9000 2.2 FroYo
